text: The 2018 FC Aktobe season is the 24th successive season that the club playing in the Kazakhstan Premier League, the highest tier of association football in Kazakhstan. Aktobe will also participate in the Kazakhstan Cup. ==Season events== After starting the season with a transfer ban, Aktobe were allowed to register new players on 20 March 2018.
